Package com.sda8.financetracker.transactions

Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
com.sda8.financetracker.transactions.Transaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Expense, Income
public abstract class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstract class to serve as a base for transaction type objects. ie. Income, Expenses, etc. The class contains setters and getters for all fields except serialVersionUID which is set to create reliable read and writes when the object is serialized.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction​(java.time.LocalDate date, double transactionValue, java.lang.String transactionType, java.lang.String transactionDescription)
      Parameters:
      date - (required) to set transaction date. Must be in LocalDate format.
      transactionValue - (required) value of transaction in type int.
      transactionType - (required) classification of transaction, preferably a single phrase.
      transactionDescription - (required) longer description of transaction.

  • Method Details

    • getDate

      public java.time.LocalDate getDate()
      Get date field value.
      Returns:
      the date field value in LocalDate format.

    • getDateString

      public java.lang.String getDateString()
      Get date field value in string readable format.
      Returns:
      the date field in readable string format. dd MMM yyyy

      Parameters:

    • getTransactionValue

      public double getTransactionValue()
      Get transaction field value.
      Returns:
      transactionValue field value.

    • setTransactionValue

      public double setTransactionValue​(double transactionValue)
      Compares transaction value argument to the field transactionValue value, sets the field value to the argument value and returns the difference.
      Parameters:
      transactionValue - of type double. Will be the used to set transactionValue field.
      Returns:
      difference in type double between parameter and transactionValue field.

    • setTransactionType

      public void setTransactionType​(java.lang.String transactionType)
      Sets the transactionType field to the string value of the parameter.
      Parameters:
      transactionType - String value of the transaction type.

      transaction description field in string format.

      public java.lang.String getTransactionType()

      transaction type field in string format.

    • setTransactionDescription

      public void setTransactionDescription​(java.lang.String transactionDescription)

      Parameters:
      transactionDescription - String value of the transaction description.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns string representation of Transaction object field values.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      string format representation of the transaction object, showing Date, Amount, Description and Type.
